content.description: Which of the following are ways in which a programmer can use abstraction to manage the complexity of a program?
content.question: Select two answers.

choices.label: Replacing each instance of repeated code with a call to a procedure
Replacing longer variable names with shorter variable names to reduce typing errors
Replacing several lines of documentation with a single line of documentation
Replacing the string variables , , , and with a list of strings called

content.answer: Replacing each instance of repeated code with a call to a procedure

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain how abstraction manages complexity.
